price: 68. Kaadu atu mannal tasbiree anu abu waamay atu adda kak aaxige waytay Yalli yoo barsel kaak iyye.
arabic: وَكَيۡفَ تَصۡبِرُ عَلَىٰ مَا لَمۡ تُحِطۡ بِهِۦ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wakayfa taṣbiru ʿalā mā lam tuḥiṭ bihi khub'ran
